creator: rfrovarp@apache.org
text:
We ship xercesImpl-2.7.1.jar and cocoon ships xercesImpl-2.9.0.jar. Ours is put
into build/lenya/webapp/WEB-INF/lib and theirs into
build/lenya/webapp/WEB-INF/lib/endorsed. Similar story with xml-apis, however we
don't have a version associated with ours and theirs is 1.3.04, however they are
different version.
Updated our versions to match cocoons in r590716
creator: rfrovarp@apache.org
